metadata.titleEn: Sedimentation data sets of black carbon and water insoluble organic carbon in Namco (2013-2017), Lulang (2014-2017), Everest (2015-2016) and Lhasa (2017-2018) precipitation
metadata.description: This data set covers the contents of black carbon and water insoluble organic carbon in precipitation at Namco Station (2013-2017), Lulang Station (2014-2017), Everest Station (2015-2016) and Lhasa Station (2017-2018, This data can be used to evaluate the temporal and spatial changes of the wet deposition rate of water insoluble carbon particles in typical areas of the Tibetan Plateau, and is an important input data for model simulation.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据集为青藏高原地区各典型站点—纳木错站（2013-2017）、鲁朗站（2014-2017）、珠峰站（2015-2016）及拉萨站（2017-2018）降水中黑碳和水不溶性有机碳的含量及各个站点的降水量数据，实地采集各个站点的降水样品后，进行过滤处理，测试每个降水事件样品的黑碳和水不溶性有机碳的含量，通过该数据可评估青藏高原典型地区水不溶性碳质颗粒物湿沉降速率的时间和空间变化，是模型模拟重要的输入数据。

authorList.unitEn: Northwest Institute of Eco-Environment and Resources, Chinese Academy of Sciences
authorList.unitCn: 中国科学院西北生态环境资源研究院

literatureList.titleEn: High particulate carbon deposition in Lhasa-a typical city in the Himalayan-Tibetan Plateau due to local contributions
literatureList.referenceEn: Yan, F., Wang, P., Kang, S., Chen, P., Hu, Z., Han, X., Sillanpaa, M., & Li, C. (2020). High particulate carbon deposition in Lhasa-a typical city in the Himalayan-Tibetan Plateau due to local contributions. Chemosphere, 247, 125843.

literatureList.titleEn: 2019. Deposition of Organic and Black Carbon: Direct Measurements at Three Remote Stations in the Himalayas and Tibetan Plateau
literatureList.referenceEn: Yan, F., He, C., Kang, S., Chen, P., Hu, Z., Han, X., Gautam, S., Yan, C., Zheng, M., Sillanpää, M., Raymond, P.A., & Li, C. (2019). Deposition of Organic and Black Carbon: Direct Measurements at Three Remote Stations in the Himalayas and Tibetan Plateau. Journal of Geophysical Research: Atmospheres, 124, 9702-9715.

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many years of data collection are covered at the 鲁朗 site for black carbon and water-insoluble organic carbon content?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 鲁朗站点的黑碳和水不溶性有机碳含量的数据收集覆盖了多少年的时间？

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What can be inferred about the temporal and spatial variability of wet deposition rates of water-insoluble carbonaceous particles from the collected precipitation samples across different sites on the Tibetan Plateau?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 从青藏高原不同地点收集的降水样本中，可以推断出不溶于水的碳质颗粒的湿沉降速率在时间和空间上的变化吗？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: From the collected precipitation samples at various sites such as Namuco, Lulang, Everest, and Lhasa, researchers can infer the temporal and spatial variability in wet deposition rates of black carbon and water-insoluble organic carbon. This can provide insights into how these rates change over time and between different geographic locations, which is crucial for understanding the distribution and impact of carbonaceous particles in the region.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 从在Namuco、Lulang、Everest和Lhasa等不同地点收集的降水样本中，研究人员可以推断黑碳和水不溶性有机碳的湿沉积速率在时间和空间上的变化。这可以提供有关这些速率如何随时间和不同地理位置变化的见解，这对于理解该地区碳质颗粒的分布和影响至关重要。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of collecting precipitation samples for black carbon and water-insoluble organic carbon analysis across various sites on the Tibetan Plateau from 2013 to 2018 on understanding regional environmental changes?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在2013年至2018年期间，在青藏高原的各个地点收集降水样本以分析黑碳和水不溶性有机碳的潜在后果是什么，这对理解区域环境变化有何影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Collecting precipitation samples for black carbon and water-insoluble organic carbon analysis across various sites on the Tibetan Plateau from 2013 to 2018 can provide valuable insights into the temporal and spatial variations in wet deposition rates of water-insoluble carbonaceous particles. This data can help model simulations to better predict environmental changes in the region, leading to a deeper understanding of the impact of carbonaceous particles on local climate, air quality, and ecosystem health.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 在2013年至2018年期间，在青藏高原的各个地点收集降水样本以分析黑碳和水不溶性有机碳，可以提供有关水不溶性碳质颗粒湿沉积速率的时间和空间变化的宝贵见解。这些数据可以帮助模型模拟，更好地预测该地区的环境变化，从而加深对碳质颗粒对当地气候、空气质量和生态系统健康影响的理解。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the primary objectives of collecting black carbon and water-insoluble organic carbon deposition data in precipitation across various Tibetan Plateau sites?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集青藏高原各个地点降水中黑碳和水不溶性有机碳沉积数据的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objectives are to evaluate the temporal and spatial variations in the wet deposition rates of water-insoluble carbonaceous particles in typical regions of the Tibetan Plateau. This data serves as crucial input for model simulations, helping to understand the environmental impact and dynamics of these particles in the region.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是评估典型地区青藏 Plateau 水不溶性碳颗粒的湿沉积速率的时间和空间变化。这些数据为模型模拟提供了重要输入，有助于理解这些颗粒在该地区的环境影响和动态。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methodologies enable the collection and analysis of black carbon and water-insoluble organic carbon in precipitation samples across various remote locations on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法论能够在青藏高原的各个偏远地点收集和分析降水样本中的黑碳和水不溶性有机碳？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The methodologies involve collecting precipitation samples from remote sites like Nam Co, Lulang, Everest, and Lhasa during specified periods. These samples are then filtered and tested to determine the content of black carbon and water-insoluble organic carbon for each precipitation event. This approach allows for the evaluation of wet deposition rates of water-insoluble carbonaceous particles in terms of their temporal and spatial variations, critical for model simulation inputs.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 这些方法涉及在指定时间段内从远程地点（如纳木措、鲁朗、珠穆朗玛峰和拉萨）收集降水样本。然后对这些样本进行过滤和测试，以确定每次降水事件中黑碳和水不溶性有机碳的含量。这种方法可以评估水不溶性碳质颗粒的湿沉积速率及其时间和空间变化，这对于模型模拟输入至关重要。
